London Spitfire Wins 2-1 over Philadelphia Fusion. Vancouver Titans win 3-1 over Houston Outlaws. Dallas Fuel Wins 4-0 over Toronto Defiant. LA Gladiators win 4-0 over Guangzhou Charge .
HIGHLIGHTS Los Angeles Gladiators vs. Guangzhou Charge | Stage 2 | Week 2 | Day 3 | Overwatch League http:// bit.ly/2UecOmE

#owinny this is such an unfortunate and punishing schedule for the guangzhou charge .. matches mostly against solid teams, with one against last stage's champions and TWO against the runner-up they got 4-0ed today too, so that makes 5 games of straight 4-0s and 6 games lost >.> pic.twitter.com/gYXZ126iDG
LA Gladiators really just 4-0’d Guangzhou Charge 5 game win streak while starting stage 2 off at 3-0... we’re lookin pretty schasty.

GG @LAGladiators , we head back to the drawing board before our next match. Thanks to our fans for all your support, keep fighting together! @Hangzhou_Spark we can't wait to play you next week #FeelTheCharge #OWL2019 #GZTough pic.twitter.com/trM8V7IeOg
Nice 4-0 victory by LAG over the Guangzhou Charge . Love seeing the Gladiators staying so strong this stage.
And now watch the Guangzhou Charge going to want LA Valiant to win tomorrow after tonight's loss

Rip my tweet didn't send early :( My predictions: London Spitfire 2:3 Philadelphia Fusion Vancouver Titans 4:0 Houston Outlaws Dallas Fuel 3:1 Toronto Defiant LA Gladiators 4:0 Guangzhou Charge My first one looking like a loss lol
